org.presentation.kernel.impl

Class CheckingExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.presentation.kernel.impl.CheckingExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stoppable, PageCrawlingObserver

    @Dependent
public class CheckingExecutor
extends Object
implements PageCrawlingObserver, Stoppable
    Class realizes flow of execution of one single checkup. Checking executor has provided one thread to work but it can also create new threads (or submodules can) if it is necessary. Note that pool of threads is limited and so one checking should NOT use more threads then 5 at one time.
    Author:
    radio.koza

    • Method Detail

      • startChecking

        public void startChecking(Checkup checkup)
        Simply start checking of Checkup passed as parameter. Method has very long duration and is blocking.
        Parameters:
        checkup - A Checkup object representing information about check that should be executed by this CheckingExecutor

      • processOnePage

        public void processOnePage(LinkURL pageUrl,
                           PageContent pageSourceCode,
                           ContentType contentType)
        This method schould be called when crawled finds new page to process.
        Specified by:
        processOnePage in interface PageCrawlingObserver
        Parameters:
        pageUrl - an absolute URL of page
        pageSourceCode - Source code of the received document
        contentType - For example: text/css, text/html, ...

      • crawlingDone

        public void crawlingDone(TraversalGraph traversalGraph,
                         CompleteCrawlingState crawlingState)
        This method schould be called when web crawler is done with crawling.
        Specified by:
        crawlingDone in interface PageCrawlingObserver
        Parameters:
        traversalGraph - Graph created by crawler
        crawlingState - State of the finished web crawler (error occured, ended by page depth, ...)

      • stopChecking

        public void stopChecking()
        Stops the control.
        Specified by:
